ambient: busy town square, sounds of people and horses, slightly somber atmosphere due to the children's mood | The scene is set near the gate of a town/city. There's a sense of everyday life mixed with the presence of soldiers. The overall atmosphere is somewhat tense due to the soldiers' behavior and the reminder of duty. | The panels transition from an indoor setting with soldiers drinking and relaxing, to a crowded street scene with civilians walking about. The atmosphere shifts from casual and relaxed to one of everyday life, with an undercurrent of the underlying tensions related to living within the walls. | The scene is set on top of a large wall with open sky and visible landscape in the background. The atmosphere is somewhat tense due to the disagreement but generally relaxed due to Hannes' perceived confidence. | The scene starts in a somewhat relaxed, possibly drunken atmosphere among the garrison members, with the sounds of them drinking and chatting. The sudden announcement of the Titan invasion shatters this atmosphere, creating a sense of urgency and chaos. The 'twitch' sound effect suggests something reacting to the news with a sudden movement. | The atmosphere is vast and expansive, emphasizing the scale of the walls and the city. The sound effect suggests a distant, possibly ominous presence or event. The scene has a neutral tone, establishing the setting. | General outdoor atmosphere near the wall, likely sunny. Sense of tension and frustration due to the confrontation.

Eren.expression: Frustrated and indignant, then thoughtful and contemplative

Hannes.expression: Casual and somewhat dismissive, then surprised and doubtful

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] A panoramic view of a walled city, looking down from a great height. A sound effect indicates distant activity.

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [neutral] fwOOO

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren and Mikasa are walking in town, upset. Eren is crying. Hannes notices and questions him.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [sad] [crying] SNIFF

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [ashamed] DON'T TELL ANYONE...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: ...THAT I WAS CRYING.

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: [calm] ...I WON'T.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [questioning] [chuckles] CRYING FOR NO REASON...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [friendly] WHY DON'T YOU HAVE YOUR DAD EXAMINE YOU?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [angry] [frustrated] DON'T BE STUPID! LIKE I CAN TELL MY OLD MAN ABOUT THIS?!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [concerned] WHAT ARE YOU CRYING ABOUT, EREN?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [surprised] [embarrassed] M-MR. HANNES!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren and Mikasa walk past members of the Garrison Regiment who are drinking. Eren is confronted about his smell of liquor and the possibility that Mikasa is angry at him. The scene shifts to Eren and Mikasa approaching the gate where they're scheduled for duty.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [mocking] DID MIKASA GET MAD AT YOU FOR SOMETHING?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [irritated] HUH?! WHAT MAKES YOU THINK I'M CRYING?!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [angry] YOU REEK OF LIQUOR!!

dialogue.speaker: Soldier
dialogue.text: [surprised] WHAT THE...?!

dialogue.speaker: Soldier
dialogue.text: [disappointed] DRINKING AGAIN...

dialogue.speaker: Soldier
dialogue.text: [inviting] WOULD YOU TWO LIKE TO JOIN IN?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [determined] OH! WE'RE ON GATE DUTY TODAY.

dialogue.speaker: Soldier
dialogue.text: [concerned] [embarrassed] NO... UM... WHAT ABOUT YOUR WORK?

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren confronts Hannes and other garrison members about drinking on duty. Suddenly, a dramatic and urgent atmosphere shifts the scene. Eren shouts about the Titans invading the town, creating panic.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [suspicious] BUT IN AN EMERGENCY, WOULD YOU BE ABLE TO FIGHT DRUNK?!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [nonchalant] WHAT'S THE BIG DEAL IF LIQUOR HAPPENS TO BE AMONG THE RATIONS SOMETIMES?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [casual] WE GET HUNGRY AND THIRSTY, HANGING OUT HERE ALL DAY.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [curious] WHAT KIND OF EMERGENCY?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [terrified] [urgent] ...AND INVADED THE TOWN!!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [concerned] I'M TALKING ABOUT IF THEY BROKE DOWN THE WALL...

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: [shocked] [terrified] !! I DON'T BELIEVE THIS! IT'S OBVIOUS!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren is arguing with Hannes and other garrison members about feeling at ease with the current situation. They are on top of the wall.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: ...THAT HASN'T HAPPENED IN A HUNDRED YEARS!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [confident] BUT I TELL YA...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [cocky] IF THE BASTARDS BREAK THROUGH THE WALL, WE'LL BE ON TOP OF THE SITUATION.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [amused] [condescending] HAHAHA...THE DOCTOR'S SON HAS SPIRIT!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [irritated] HEY, EREN! DON'T SUDDENLY RAISE YOUR VOICE LIKE THAT...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [determined] [angry] MY FATHER SAYS SO!!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [hesitant] WELL...YOU MAY BE RIGHT.

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: [fearful] [worried] B-BUT IT'S DANGEROUS TO FEEL AT EASE LIKE THIS!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [calm] [respectful] I'M NOT GONNA SECOND-GUESS DR. YEAGER, THIS TOWN'S BENE-FACTOR. BUT Y'KNOW...

dialogue.speaker: Narration
dialogue.text: [matter-of-factly] WHEN YOU BECOME A SOLDIER, YOU GET YOUR CHANCE TO SEE 'EM, HANGING AROUND OUTSIDE THE WALL WHILE YOU'RE ON WALL DEFENSE DUTY OR WHATEVER...

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren and Mikasa confront garrison members about their complacency and lack of preparedness. They are near the wall, emphasizing its size and the perceived threat.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] THAT AIN'T A BAD IDEA EITHER!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [angry] [furious] W-WHAT THE HELL?! SO STOP CALLING YOURSELVES A "GARRISON" AND MAKE IT THE "WALL CONSTRUCTION CORPS" INSTEAD!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [dismissive] NOPE.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] [mocking] THEN YOU'RE NOT EVEN PREPARED TO FIGHT 'EM IN THE FIRST PLACE, ARE YOU?!

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: [serious] [questioning] ON THE OTHER HAND, WHEN THE GUYS AND I ARE MOCKED AS GOOD-FOR-NOTHING SPONGES, THAT TELLS YOU WE'RE ALL LIVIN' IN A TIME OF PEACE, AM I RIGHT?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [resigned] [reflective] YOU HAVE SOLDIERS ON ACTIVE DUTY WHEN THE SITUATION HAS GONE TO HELL...

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: [concerned] [warning] BUT EREN...

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren expresses his frustration with those who want to live a sheltered life within the walls, while Hannes and others in the garrison discuss Eren's ambition to join the Survey Corps with disbelief.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [neutral] IT'S JUST LIKE HANNES SAYS.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [angry] HELL... I CAN'T UNDERSTAND THOSE GUYS IN THE SURVEY CORPS WHO WANNA GO OUTSIDE THE WALL!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [angry] BUT IF THEY WANNA HAVE FUN PLAYING WAR, LET 'EM, I SAY!!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [thoughtful] ...ISN'T THAT... ...LIKE BEING A CAGED ANIMAL?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [calm] WE DON'T HAVE TO GO OUTSIDE THE WALL FOR OUR WHOLE LIVES... WE CAN EAT, SLEEP AND SURVIVE JUST FINE HERE... BUT...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [surprised] DON'T TELL ME... ...HE WANTS TO JOIN THE SURVEY CORPS?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] PFFT... WHAT A CRACKPOT...
